product_name: IT CosmeticsHydrate with Confidence Anti-Aging Skincare Set
summary: SummaryWake up to the skin of your dreams with the IT Cosmetics Hydrate with Confidence Anti-Aging Skincare Set. It includes everything you need to keep your skin healthy and hydrated during the day and while you sleep.
details: DetailsBenefits4-piece, anti-aging skincare gift set features your day-to-night Confidence skincare routineEach product is dermatologist-tested for all skin types, especially sensitive or dry skinWith high-performance ingredients including ceramides and hyaluronic acid for dramatic results instantly and over timeIncludesConfidence in a Cream Anti-Aging Hydrating Moisturizer (Full Size 60 ml)Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream (Travel Size 14 ml)Confidence in a Cleanser (Travel Size 50 ml)Confidence in an Eye Cream (Trial Size 5 ml)Item 2638647How To Use• Morning and night, use Confidence in a Cleanser to gently wash away impurities without stripping the skin. • Dab a pea-size amount of Confidence in an Eye Cream from inner to outer eye and smooth onto upper lid and brow bone. • Hydrate your entire face with a quarter-size amount of Confidence in a Cream during the day and Confidence in Your Beauty Sleep Night Cream before bed.IngredientsConfidence in a CreamAQUA / WATER / EAU, GLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, HYDROXYETHYLPIPERAZINE ETHANE SULFONIC ACID, GLYCERYL STEARATE, SQUALANE, DIMETHICONE, MYRISTYL MYRISTATE, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, BUTYROSPERMUM reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: No. I dod not like it. I return the product. It's Cosmetics broke my skin out within two days of using. The print on the box is small. So I could not see it. I told the sale person word. I ask if there any fragrance. She told me no, but it do. I used the Yuka app.

reviews.headline: Me encantan
reviews.comments: Tengo tiempo usándolas y me encantan porque hidratan mi cara, luce joven y están a un excelente precio

rollup.name: Hydrate with Confidence Anti-Aging Skincare Set
